primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The search for a 'disinterested' love for God (Religion pur) that persists despite suffering and the silence of God, moving beyond the 'mercantile' logic of reward and punishment.

subject.identificatie: The Human/Hiob (and the Preacher/Hearer as co-subjects)
tekstueel_bewijs: Ich lasse die Toten nicht allein, ich gebe die Hoffnung nicht auf
In Deine Lieb versenken will ich mich ganz hinab

object.identificatie: Mystical love 'without a why' (Amour fou) / Integrity of faith
tekstueel_bewijs: eine liebende und absichtsfreie Begegnung zweier Freiheiten
Religion pur, die nicht aus Angst vor Strafen reagiert

zender.identificatie: The Truth / The 'Hidden' God of the Cross
tekstueel_bewijs: Gott hat uns gelehrt, groß vom Menschen zu denken

ontvanger.identificatie: God (who wins the bet) and the Human (who gains dignity)
tekstueel_bewijs: hilft so Gott, die Wette zu gewinnen
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

tekstueel_bewijs: Der andere Gott, der Hiob geworden ist
helper.rol_van_god: God is both the Opponent (as the silent/powerful one) and the Helper (as the suffering Christ).

tegenstander.identificatie: The Spirit of Merchantry (Satan) / The Friends' Ideology
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is the very structure of 'do ut des' (mercantile logic) which threatens the possibility of true love.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The political/ethical solidarity with the tortured and the victims of history.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer/Preacher
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The mystical love for God (Program 1) enables the 'dignity of inconsolability' and solidarity (Program 2).

voorbeelden_god_subject: Gott hat Hiob in die Hand des Satans gegeben
Gott hat uns gelehrt, groß vom Menschen zu denken
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Ich lasse die Toten nicht allein
Wir sollten es aufgeben, Gott zu verteidigen

voorbeelden: Es ist die Pflicht der Sprache des Glaubens
Ich möchte Hiobs Frau verstehen lernen
mein Herz will ich Dir schenken
Religion nur versteht, wenn man die Liebe zu Gott 'ohne Warum' denken kann
Kann sie sich auch im Leiden durchhalten?
Gott hilft so Gott, die Wette zu gewinnen

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the 'Willing' (Desire) of the soul to love God without calculation, a mystical recruitment of the heart.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (The Friends/Satan) to ~S2 (Theodicy rejection) to ~S1 (Atheistic shadow) and finally to S1 (Mystical love/Christ).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved not by explanation, but by the 'Other Hiob' (Christ) who loses the bet of life but embodies the face of God.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; the 'Deal' is presented as a cosmic temptation.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While the human is very active as a subject, it is a 'passive activity' of mystical surrender. It avoids moralism by rejecting the 'law of reward' and grounding the human's ability to love in the suffering of Christ.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Ich lasse die Toten nicht allein, ich gebe die Hoffnung nicht auf

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Der andere Gott, der Hiob geworden ist

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Hiob is used as a model of 'disinterested faith', but specifically as one who 'helps God win', shifting the focus to God's reputation.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God maintains his love for Hiob even when he delivers him to Satan (Theocentric).

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Faith is seen as a 'mystical participation' rather than a 'legal standing'.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The dialogue structure between Sölle and Steffensky creates a dialectic that mirrors the tension between the 'God of Power' and the 'God of Love'.
spanning_punten: The tension between 'God as Opponent' (Sölle) and 'God as Power' (Steffensky).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: In Deine Lieb versenken will ich mich ganz hinab

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is not explicitly named, but the 'Pouvoir' is granted through the 'Face of Christ'.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is defined here as 'Kaufmannschaft' (treating God as a vending machine).

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully dismantles the moralistic 'Subject = Man, Object = Reward' structure, replacing it with a 'Subject = Man, Object = God's Glory' mystical structure.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The hearer might feel they must achieve 'Amour fou' by their own strength.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that the 'Other Hiob' (Christ) has already won the bet for us.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus more on how the 'Face of Christ' enables the heart to love.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A profound deconstruction of moralistic religion that uses the Actantial model to expose the 'deal' we try to make with God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the Sölle/Steffensky dialogue; semiotics reveals they are two voices of one Subject searching for one Object.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would argue about the Hebrew 'Chinam'; semiotics shows how 'Chinam' functions as the 'Value-Object' of the whole narrative.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Friends' are not just characters, but the 'Opponent' actant representing a specific semiotic system (The Mercantile).

volledige_subject_lijst: Gott (fragt, fordert, führt vor, lässt Muskeln spielen)
Wir (lassen nicht allein, geben Hoffnung nicht auf, versenken uns)
appendices.notities: The sermon is a rare example of 'Grace' that doesn't sound 'cheap' because the Opponent (Suffering/Satan) is taken with extreme seriousness.
